code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 78 year old white female retired with C/O Body Aches for 3 weeks that is frequent. o:Height 61 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt presents w/ c/o 3 days h/o Body Aches. she is a female aged 78 yrs. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life drinks daily o:Height 60 in, Weight 139 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgM CSF.

s:patient complains of Body Aches x 3 days. NKDA. she is a white female aged 79 Ys. Patient is a moderate drinker she does not smoke o:Height 61 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17, B burgdorferi IgM CSF positive a:Lyme Disease p:administered amoxicillin/calvulanate - 875 mg 2x day, performed B burgdorferi IgM CSF, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
